userSettings.saveSettingsSuccessAlert: Your Settings have been successfully saved.

personalAccessTokens.title: Personal Access Tokens
personalAccessTokens.customMin: The value must be at least 1.
personalAccessTokens.customMax: The value exceeds the maximum lifetime for personal access tokens.

userSettings.notificationSettingsFilterInfo: These settings also filter the notification sidebar

settingNames.programmingTestCasesChanged: Changed Test Cases for Programming Exercises

settingDescriptions.basicWeeklySummaryDescription: Receive a basic weekly summary every Friday at 5pm (e.g. what new exercises have been released this week and are still open)
settingDescriptions.exerciseReleasedDescription: Get notified when a new exercise has been released
settingDescriptions.exerciseOpenForPracticeDescription: Get notified when an exercise has been opened for practice (e.g. Quiz)
settingDescriptions.exerciseSubmissionAssessedDescription: Get notified when your exercise submissions get assessed
settingDescriptions.attachmentChangesDescription: Receive a notification when an attachment was changed
settingDescriptions.newExercisePostDescription: Get notified when a new exercise post has been created
settingDescriptions.newReplyForExercisePostDescription: Get notified when a new reply for an exercise post has been created
settingDescriptions.newLecturePostDescription: Get notified when a new lecture post has been created
settingDescriptions.newReplyForLecturePostDescription: Get notified when a new reply for a lecture post has been created
settingDescriptions.newCoursePostDescription: Receive a notification when a new course-wide post has been created
settingDescriptions.newReplyForCoursePostDescription: Receive a notification when a new reply for a course-wide post has been created
settingDescriptions.newAnnouncementPostDescription: Receive a notification when a new announcement has been created
settingDescriptions.courseAndExamArchivingStartedDescription: Receive a notification when the process of archiving a course or exam has been started
settingDescriptions.fileSubmissionSuccessfulDescription: Receive a notification after you successfully submitted a file upload exercise
settingDescriptions.programmingTestCasesChangedDescription: Get notified if test cases for a programming exercises have been changed
